faction_profile.name: 무당파 (Wudang Sect / 武當派)
alias: North Star of the Martial Forest (Mu-rim Tae-san-buk-du / often shared with Shaolin)

location.mountain: Mt. Wudang (무당산 / 武當派) - Combines the grandeur of Tai and danger of Hua.
location.base: Golden Summit (Geumjeong) on Heavenly Pillar Peak (Cheonju-bong / 1612m).
landmarks: Taihe Palace (Taehwa-gung / 太和宮) - The Golden Hall built by Emperor Yongle.

heritage.founder: Zhang Sanfeng (Jang Sam-bong / 張三豊) - A legendary Taoist Immortal.
heritage.philosophy: Taoism (Do-ga). Emphasizes 'Softness overcomes Hardness' (Yu-neung-je-gang) and 'Harmony of Yin and Yang'.
heritage.symbol: Taiji (Yin-Yang Symbol) and the Tortoise/Snake (Symbol of Xuanwu/Jinmu).

status.reputation: The standard of Taoist martial arts. Known for defensive and counter-attacking styles.

hierarchy: Dosa (Taoist Priest): Remains in the mountain.
Sokga-jeja (Lay Disciple): Wealthy patrons learning basic arts.
structure.places: Divided into 8 Palaces (Pal-gung), 2 Temples (I-gwan), 36 Nunneries (Am-dang), 72 Shrines (Am-myo).

combat_style.visuals: Slow but unstoppable. Circles (Taiji) deflecting straight attacks.
core_mechanics: Taiji (太極): Using the opponent's force against them.
Liangyi (Two Ultimates / 兩儀): Coordination of Yin and Yang.
combat_style.tactics: Waiting for the opponent to move first, then arriving first (Hu-bal-je-in).

signature_ultimate.name: 태극권 & 태극검 (Taiji Fist & Taiji Sword)
signature_ultimate.description: The pinnacle of Wudang arts. Created by Zhang Sanfeng. Understanding the circular flow of nature.

list.name: 양의검 (Two Ultimates Sword)
list.description: Exploits the harmony of Yin and Yang. Often used as a dual-person formation.

list.name: 요지유검 (Soft Finger Winding Sword)
list.description: A flexible sword art that can bend around defenses like a ribbon.

list.name: 면장 (Cotton Palm / Myeon-jang)
list.effect: Soft touch that destroys internal organs. 'Needle hidden in cotton'.

list.name: 순양무극공 (Pure Yang Limitless Art)
list.grade: Supreme. Builds massive, pure internal energy.

list: 무당구양신공 (Wudang Nine Yang Art) - Reference to H 의천도룡기.

movement.effect: Allows the user to step on air/their own foot to jump higher mid-air. Famous gravity-defying art.

list: 진무칠절진 (True Martial Seven Severing Formation) - Extremely powerful 7-man formation.

narrative_role: The 'Older Brother' of the Orthodox faction (Serious, heavy, reliable).
A sect that emphasizes internal cultivation over flashy moves.
The usual rival to Shaolin for the title of 'Number One Sect'.
A place where the protagonist learns the true meaning of 'Softness' and 'Nature'.
